item.title: Reducing Fractions
item.description: Use the Euclidic algorithm for GCD, then the new nominator is "n / gcd(n,d)" and the new denominator is "d / gcd(n, d)".

item.title: Modulo
item.description: y % x splits y in chunks of size x, the result being the size of the rest, the started, incomplete chunk , meaning x % 45 = 29 means the last chunk is only of size 29, not 45. Also useful to do something on every i-th iteration.
